divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down I-26, when I saw what appeared to be two headlights in the sky, a third red one. It moved slowly, fly close to tree level. When it got nearly above me, I could not see an out line of the plane. These head lights turned out to be a diamond shape craft with four white lights on each corner. The vaguely remember the red lights location. I slowed to the minimum speed and rolled down my window to make sure my eyes weren't tricking me. This was the second time I've seen a UFO in Charleston, so upon the first moments I felt fear that they were back, yet exclusiveness to the situations a lot of people don't witness.. It moved south west disappearing into the fog.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ladson
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Oval shaped object with 4 lights, and one red light.
